channel.title: Posts on Gaston Sanchez
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Gaston Sanchez

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Welcome to my tech blog! here I’ll be writing about tech topics that I’m interested in. I’ll try to avoid touching personal stuff since I want to have my career stuff separated from my personal stuff. This blog is intended to be used by me, to reference stuff that I learnt and forgot and to have an online presence that future employers can see. Nevertheless, if you are a geek like me I hope the blog is interesting to you!
